projectGridLines.stationName: Lenskart Solutions Private Limited, Bhiwandi, Gurugram
projectGridLines.title: Projects
projectGridLines.description:
Required Skill Sets

  • Technical Skills: Python, Excel, Data Analytics
  • Analytical Skills: Problem Solving

Desired Traits

  • Relevant Fields: Electrical, Mechanical, Chemical, Industrial
  • Personal Qualities: Collaboration, Willingness to learn, Experimentation, Ownership

Expectations

  • Primary Task: Work on engineering/supply chain-based live business problem statements.
  • Responsibilities:
  • Completely own the charter.
  • Take guidance from mentors and other stakeholders.
  • Be ready to think outside the box and focus on execution.

Expected Learning Outcomes

  • Application of Knowledge: Marry theoretical learnings to practical business outcomes.
  • Learning Opportunities:
  • Immense learning across diverse areas of manufacturing and operations.
  • Solve problems impacting customers.
  • Gain in-depth knowledge of optical manufacturing and operations processes.

Specific Courses Required for the Project

  • Data Analysis
  • Problem Solving

Project Names and Descriptions

  1. Improving Efficiencies of Warehousing Using Data Analytics & Machine Learning
  2. Enhancing Efficiency of Lens Manufacturing Laboratory
  3. Reduction in Product Quality Returns

Additional Projects for Students in Other Fields

  1. Quality Improvement Charter
  • Description: Focus on quality improvement initiatives within manufacturing.
  1. Process Excellence and Improvement Charters
  • Description: Enhance and streamline manufacturing processes.
  1. Lens Lab Process Optimization Charter
  • Description: Optimize processes within the lens laboratory.

Specific Projects in Frames Manufacturing

  1. Quality Improvement of Frames (Acetate, TR & Metal)
  2. Process Standardization for Frames
  • Description: Create value stream maps for frames manufacturing and develop SOPs.
  1. Automation Philosophy & Business Case Preparation
  • Description: Develop a business case for reducing manpower in frames manufacturing through automation.
